column5: This cozy room is on the first floor, great for solo business traveler. We have other tenants upstairs. Shower is shared with tenants. This is a strictly NO smoking house. Smoking (cigarettes, cigars, e-cig or medical cannabis) is NOT allowed anywhere, inside the house or outside, anywhere in the property. If you are a smoker, this place is not for you.
column8: Comfy bed, cozy room for solo business traveler!
